name: Planet Space Escape
description: DESCRIPTION  Planet Space Escape is a side-scroller , in which you have to bring a planet trough different levels. You have to overcome obstacles and abysses. The difficulty  will get harder the further you come.  NEWS AND UPDATES The game is still in development but a first version of it is  playable , it inclueds 4 level. You can download install.exe now. How to play • Enter your NAME to show up in the Highscore  • You play with the ARROW KEY S  • Use SPACE to jump  • Zoom in and out with click on the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON     (available only in a few levels)  • Press Esc to get into Pause Menu
